programme.title: Unsportsmanlike with Evan, Canty and Michelle
programme.desc: Start the day off right with Chris Canty, Evan Cohen and Michelle Smallmon providing an energizing and informative way to take on the day. Sports, life and laughter are what it's all about.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 17 Tigers streak into their American Athletic Conference affair with the Owls. Memphis has won six straight and 10 of its last 11. The loss came against Temple 88-81. PJ Haggerty (MEM) is among the nation's leaders with 21.7 points per game.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: PJ Haggerty and the No. 14 Tigers (20-4, 10-1 American) ride a seven-game win streak into a road test against the Bulls (12-12, 5-6). Haggerty, a sophomore guard, averages a team-best 21.6 points per outing after totaling 69 over his past three.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 22 Tigers (21-5, 11-2 American) and Owls (15-11, 8-5) look to get back to their winning ways. Memphis saw an eight-game win streak halted at Wichita State in overtime Feb. 16. Wichita State also ended Florida Atlantic's run at five Feb. 20.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 18 Tigers seek the season-series sweep of the Blazers when they meet in Alabama. Memphis dropped a century on UAB in the Jan. 26 meeting, claiming a 100-77 victory. Dain Dainja posted 21 points and eight rebounds in that win for the Tigers.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 16 Tigers (25-5, 15-2 American) prep for the postseason by facing the Bulls (13-17, 6-11). Memphis clinched the top seed in the American Athletic Conference Tournament by topping UTSA 75-70 on March 4. The Tigers have won 12 of their last 13.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Lions try to turn the tide against the Gaels. Saint Mary's has won 23 of the past 24 meetings after sweeping two games versus Loyola Marymount in 2023-24. Saint Mary's is led by Lithuanian senior Augustas Marciulionis and his 14 points per game.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Bulldogs resume their revenge tour by facing the Gaels. The two have met in the last six West Coast Conference tournaments, with Saint Mary's winning the 2024 final. Gonzaga avenged a loss to Oregon State by thumping the Beavers 98-60 on Jan. 28.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Gaels (20-3, 10-0 WCC) look to keep rolling against the Dons (18-6, 8-3). Saint Mary's has won 10 in a row, a stretch that includes a 71-51 decision against San Francisco on Jan. 23 for the Gaels' 11th straight victory over the Dons.

programme.title: Unsportsmanlike with Evan, Canty and Michelle
programme.desc: Start the day off right with Chris Canty, Evan Cohen and Michelle Smallmon providing an energizing and informative way to take on the day. Sports, life and laughter are what it's all about.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: Augustas Marciulionis and the Gaels (22-4, 12-1) host the Cougars (16-10, 6-7) for a West Coast Conference contest. Marciulionis averages 14.2 points per game after totaling 62 in his past three, and shot 15-for-20 from the field over his last two.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Gaels (24-4, 14-1 WCC) seek their first regular-season sweep of the rival Bulldogs (21-7, 12-3) since 2016. First-place Saint Mary's has won 14 of its last 15, including a 62-58 win over Gonzaga. The Gaels are 7-1 in true road games.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The upstart No. 9 Waves face the No. 1 Gaels in the West Coast Conference Tournament semifinals. Pepperdine bounced No. 4 Santa Clara 78-76 after upsetting Portland and Oregon State. Saint Mary's beat Pepperdine twice en route to a 17-1 WCC record.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 1 Gaels face the No. 2 Bulldogs once again in the West Coast Conference final. The programs have combined to win the past 16 WCC titles, with Saint Mary's ending Gonzaga's four-year reign in 2024. The Gaels swept the regular-season series.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Sun Devils fly with the No. 11 Jayhawks. Kansas bounced back after suffering its first conference-opening loss since 1991 on Dec. 31, 2024, by trouncing UCF 99-48 on Jan. 5. Arizona State beat Colorado 81-61 behind 19 points from BJ Freeman.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 2 Cyclones (14-1, 4-0 Big 12) play the No. 9 Jayhawks (12-3, 3-1). Iowa State has won 11 in a row after prevailing in a nail-biter at Texas Tech. Joshua Jefferson sent the game to overtime and scored the winning free throws in the 85-84 win.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 12 Jayhawks (13-4, 4-2) try to keep a grip on the Big 12 foe Horned Frogs (10-7, 3-3). Kansas leads the series 26-4, but TCU won two of the last six meetings. Jayhawks center Hunter Dickinson averages 15.8 points and 10.2 rebounds per game.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: Big 12 heavyweights clash as the No. 7 Cougars (15-3, 7-0) visit the No. 12 Jayhawks (14-4, 5-2). Houston has won 11 in a row. The home side won both 2023-24 meetings. Kansas senior Hunter Dickinson averaged 17.2 points over his last six outings.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 16 Jayhawks host a rematch with the No. 8 Cyclones. Kansas leads the all-time series 190-69, but Iowa State has won three of the past four after a 74-57 decision Jan. 15. Curtis Jones (ISU) torched Kansas for 25 points with five 3-pointers.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 16 Jayhawks (16-6, 7-4 Big 12) meet the Wildcats (11-11, 5-6) for a Sunflower Showdown. Kansas added to its record amount of wins against Kansas State with its 206th on Jan. 18, as Hunter Dickinson's 25 points paced an 84-74 Jayhawks victory.
